item.title: Rehoboth Beach Film Festival Sets 2025 Lineup Featuring ‘The Choral,’ ‘She Dances’ and ‘The Inside’
item.description: The Rehoboth Beach International Film Festival has unveiled this year’s lineup, set to take place Nov. 3–9 for its 27th year in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware. This year’s lineup will include titles such as
